item.value: package day0208;\R\Rimport java\.util\.Scanner;\R\Rpublic class 농작물수확하기2 \{\R\tstatic int\[\]\[\] dir = \{\{0,1\},\{0,-1\},\{1,0\},\{-1,0\}\}; //오른쪽 왼쪽 아래 위\R\tstatic boolean inside\(int y, int x, int Size\)\R\t\{\R\t\treturn \(y>=0 && y<Size\) && \(x>=0 && x<Size\);\R\t\}\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\t// TODO Auto-generated method stub\R\t\tScanner scan = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\tint testcase = scan\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\tfor\(int t=1; t<=testcase; \+\+t\)\R\t\t\{\R\t\t\tint sum = 0;\R\t\t\tint N = scan\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\t\tString\[\] arr = new String\[N\];\R\t\t\tint\[\]\[\] map = new int\[N\]\[N\];\R\t\t\tboolean\[\]\[\] visit = new boolean\[N\]\[N\];\R\t\t\tfor\(int i =0 ; i<N; \+\+i\)\R\t\t\t\tarr\[i\] = scan\.next\(\);\R\R\t\t\tfor\(int i=0; i<N; \+\+i\)\R\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<N; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\tmap\[i\]\[j\] = Integer\.parseInt\(arr\[i\]\.charAt\(j\)\+""\);\R\R\t\t\tint y = N/2;\R\t\t\tint x = N/2;\R\t\t\tvisit\[y\]\[x\] = true;\R\t\t\tsum \+= map\[y\]\[x\];\R\R\R\t\t\t\t//System\.out\.println\(p\.y \+"," \+p\.x\);\R\t\t\t\t//4방탐색\R\t\t\t\tfor\(int d=0; d<4; \+\+d\)\R\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\tint nexty = y\+dir\[d\]\[0\];\R\t\t\t\t\tint nextx = x\+dir\[d\]\[1\];\R\R\R\t\t\t\t\tif\(inside\(nexty, nextx, N\) && visit\[nexty\]\[nextx\]==false\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\tsum \+= map\[nexty\]\[nextx\];\R\t\t\t\t\t\tvisit\[nexty\]\[nextx\] = true;\R\R\t\t\t\t\t\tif\(nexty == 0 \|\| nexty == N-1 \|\| nextx == 0 \|\| nextx == N-1\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\}\R\R\t\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("#"\+t\+" "\+sum\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\}\R\}\R

package day0208;\R\Rimport java\.util\.Scanner;\Rimport java\.util\.Stack;\R\Rpublic class 단어뒤집기2 \{\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\tStack<Character> s = new Stack<>\(\);\R\t\tScanner scan = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\tString str = scan\.nextLine\(\);\R\R\R\t\t\tfor\(int j =0; j<sub\[i\]\.length\(\); \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\tif\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(j\) == '<'\)\R\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\tSystem\.out\.print\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(j\)\);\R\t\t\t\t\tdo\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\tSystem\.out\.print\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(\+\+j\)\);\R\t\t\t\t\t\}while\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(j\) != '>'\);\R\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\telse\R\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\twhile\(true\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\ts\.add\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(j\+\+\)\);\R\t\t\t\t\t\tif\(j == sub\[i\]\.length\(\)\) break;\R\t\t\t\t\t\tif\(sub\[i\]\.charAt\(j\) == '<'\) break;\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\R\t\t\t\t\t--j;\R\t\t\t\t\twhile\(!s\.empty\(\)\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\tSystem\.out\.print\(s\.pop\(\)\);\R\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\tSystem\.out\.print\(" "\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\}\R\}\R
